articles.content: Royal Challengers Bangalore pacer Josh Hazlewood said he "got pretty lucky" with his very wide delivery that was not called wide by the umpire, leading to Marcus Stoinis' wicket in their IPL match ag… [+2064 chars]

articles.description: Mahela Jayawardene was critical of Sri Lankan police who opened fire at anti-government protestors, killing at least one person.
